<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:67b6741b97b591106881bf36f053afc0=javascript:phone.match(/^^[1-9][0-9]{7,14}$/)^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="New User Ex1">30b3b8d797b591106881bf36f053af29</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>false</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>false</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	
	phoneStr = phone + '';
	g_form.addInfoMessage(phoneStr);
	
	if(phoneStr.match(/^[1-9][0-9]{7,14}$/)){
      g_form.addInfoMessage("OK");
    }
    else {
     g_form.addErrorMessage("Phone number must be between 8 and 15 digits");
    }
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Checks phone number is between 8 and 15 digits</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-12 23:00:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ef530d9797f591106881bf36f053afad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Checks phone number is between 8 and 15 digits</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_ef530d9797f591106881bf36f053afad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-13 14:59:29</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
